name: LIFE SCIENCES PENNSYLVANIA
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions:
Inform and educate congressional offices on the importance of Pennsylvania's life sciences community to patients and the Commonwealth's economy.
Strong IP/Patent protections - e.g. Stronger Patents Ac
